name: A Love Letter to the Cosmos
name_original: A Love Letter to the Cosmos
description:
You've been lost to the dark of space during emergency repairs.

They will not return for you.

You only have minutes left to live. Transmit your final words back to wherever it is you call home.

...is that thing getting closer?

---------------------------------------

A small VN made for Horror Jam - Space. 

This is my very first attempt at participating in a GameJam - I had a lot of fun, but definitely felt the limited timeframe!
